title: The supports...
body:
*I'm a support main*
Ok, so i'm playing Zyra for the first time and i got a good score but there's this {{champion:238}} who was pretty shit.

He ks-es me, then i ask "what was that for?"

"Your just a support"

The support that supports get is shit.

The funny thing was {{champion:238}} was Bronze V.

replies.body: Silver 5 making fun of bronze 5 and you got silver from placements plus had bronze last season and couldn't get out. Please carry yourself from bronze before shots fired, you can't even get past silver 5.

1) I made Silver II last season
2) Yes i did carry
3) I'm not trying to make fun of him. I'm trying to make awareness of supports.

So think before you type.

Supports don't get kills but if you must to secure it then its fine, that Zed did nothing wrong and there is no such thing as kill stealing, you wanna know what ks means up in high elo? It means kill secured.

And i was the only one who brought the enemy to 1 hp.

Do i still not deserve it?

Doesn't matter, sure its a bit of a %%%% move but you should not care, a good player will not care, i haven't complained about someone taking my kill for over a year now because i'm not some low elo player anymore, i learnt the game and you should too, ks means kill secured, no such thing as kill stealing and once you understand that you will get better at the game.
Dont be mean to Just
I'm not being mean in any way.

Just talk less cause some people my see it being mean. Just saying stuff can be be a little offensive, things like "you will get better at the game". And I'm thinking he knows bout kill stealing but just wants relieve himself

If you see it as being mean then you're probably young or uneducated, sorry but my comment was in no way mean and saying "you will get better at the game" is a good thing, how on earth is that comment negative?

If he knew about kill stealing he wouldn't have made this thread, this is nothing to complain about, it sounds to me like hes just a low elo player complaining about kill stealing and hasn't learnt the game yet, there's been hundreds of other threads just like this one.

Its fine, hes learning just like many others are but when a player like myself with over two years experience comes and explains certain things you don't just dismiss it and think you're right when clearly you are not, like i said you learn the game and you will get better, when a better player tells you certain things you listen and learn don't just think you're right.
There is kill stealing as much as there is CSing, the difference is that you realize the difference tends to be small enough not to risk the game by %%%%%ing about it.

Deserve it?!?!? Wtf are you on about kid the only reason a support would take a kill over a carry is if it's simply to secure it if there's a chance they could escape... This way of thinking you have is like low Bronze level so fix that up that attitude and you might become decent.
And i brought him MYSELF from Full HP to 1 hp, do i still not deserve it?

The main idea of a support is to.. support, not take kills.  A good support champion does not need kills to be effective, thats their whole design, if you cannot see this, then play a carry roll, or play another game.

zzz do what you want then, just don't complain when the **carry roles** fail to carry you because you thought it would best to rack up a few "deserved" kills for your kd which is very important for all supports.

> Silver 5 making fun of bronze 5 and you got silver from placements plus had bronze last season and couldn't get out. Please carry yourself from bronze before shots fired, you can't even get past silver 5.

Did I hear someone say, logic?
Nope nevermind

Support - not meant to get kills (unless it is a 1v1 situation such as {{champion:53}} vs {{champion:12}}  etc.)

KS - Kill Secured not Kill Stolen like the community would have you believe

And if they give %%%%, mute them so you don't have to listen to whiny %%%%%es like that zed (supposedly)

If you watch the LCS, you will probably pick up that there seems to be not a single rule on the distribution of kills, and anyone can take them to make sure they are secure.
Assist gold, plus the ability to freely farm goes a long way if you are building well and farming well.
Except when they steal a penta XD

Tweekerz Biggest hypocrite OCE jesus

>  before shots fired, you can't even get past silver 5.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=tweekerz

(Tomat0 don't git me for namerino shamerino)
Sorry didn't realise that I was the hypocrite because I was the one making fun of bronze elo players? Do you even know the meaning of the word Hypocrite?

A person who speaks about another person for their actions in a negative connotation but is and or does similar or the exact same.

Ill just leave this here.

I'd say it depends on what you are going to build and what your team needs.Like if your team needs damage because your midlaner is so behind and you are like... Leona, I suggest probably donating it. If you're someone like Karma and you want that sexy, sexy AP though...

> He ks-es me

dumbass. absolute dumbass. how does this thread have upvotes.
